t: Trivial Pursuit Bet You Know It Game : Amazon.co.uk: Toys & Games
s: The most inclusive and exciting game of Trivial Pursuit yet. Bet You Know It brings high stakes to this classic game. When you play Trivial Pursuit Bet You Know It, you don’t have to know all the answers to win. It’s what you think your friends know that really counts.

t: Trivial Pursuit: Bet You Know It | Board Game | BoardGameGeek
s: From the back of the box: Bet You Know It brings high stakes to Trivial Pursuit. On each turn you'll bet whether your opponent knows the answer. Guess correctly and you can use your winnings to buy wedges, or earn your wedges on your turn by answering questions.
